items.desc: A perfectly generic item lies in front of you.
items.take: You grab the perfectly generic item.

FOREST0.name: Clearing Entrance
FOREST0.desc:
You find yourself at the entrance to a clearing. 
You hear the rustling of leaves in the wind. 
You're here to complete your duties as Sealkeeper. 
It's best not to dally.

FOREST1.name: Forest Southwest Corner
FOREST1.desc:
You're deep in the forest, about as far southwest as you'll go. 
You hear the rustling of leaves in the wind.

FOREST2.name: Southwestern Forest
FOREST2.desc:
You're deep in the forest, about as far south as you'll go. 
You hear the rustling of leaves in the wind.

FOREST3.desc:
You find yourself at the entrance to a clearing. 
You hear the rustling of leaves in the wind.

FOREST4.desc:
You're deep in the forest, about as far south as you'll go. 
You hear the rustling of leaves in the wind.

FOREST6.desc:
You're deep in the forest, about as far west as you'll go. 
You hear the rustling of leaves in the wind.

FOREST7.name: Clearing Southwest
FOREST7.desc:
You're on the southwest side of a forest clearing. 
You hear the rustling of leaves in the wind.

FOREST8.desc:
You're on the south side of a forest clearing.

FOREST9.desc:
You're on the south side of a forest clearing. 
You hear the rustling of leaves in the wind.

FOREST10.name: Southeastern Forest
FOREST10.desc:
You're deep in the forest, about as far east as you'll go. 
You hear the rustling of leaves in the wind.

FOREST11.name: western Forest
FOREST11.desc:
You're deep in the forest, about as far west as you'll go. 
You hear the rustling of leaves in the wind.

FOREST12.desc:
You're on the west side of a forest clearing. 
You hear the rustling of leaves in the wind.

FOREST13.name: Clearing Center
FOREST13.desc:
You're in the center of a forest clearing. 
You hear the rustling of leaves in the wind.

FOREST14.name: Clearing East
FOREST14.desc:
You're on the east side of a forest clearing. 
You hear the rustling of leaves in the wind.

FOREST15.desc:
You're deep in the forest, about as far east as you'll go. 
You hear the rustling of leaves in the wind.

FOREST16.name: Northwestern Forest
FOREST16.desc:
You're deep in the forest, about as far west as you'll go. 
You hear the rustling of leaves in the wind.

FOREST17.desc:
You're on the northwest side of a forest clearing. 
You hear the rustling of leaves in the wind.

FOREST18.name: Clearing North
FOREST18.desc:
You're on the north side of a forest clearing. 
You hear the rustling of leaves in the wind.

FOREST19.name: Clearing Northeast
FOREST19.desc:
You're on the northeast side of a forest clearing. 
You hear the rustling of leaves in the wind.

FOREST20.name: Northeastern Forest
FOREST20.desc:
You're deep in the forest, about as far east as you'll go. 
You hear the rustling of leaves in the wind.

FOREST21.name: Forest Northwest Corner
FOREST21.desc:
You're deep in the forest, about as far northwest as you'll go. 
You hear the rustling of leaves in the wind.

FOREST22.name: Northwestern Forest
FOREST22.desc:
You're deep in the forest, about as far north as you'll go. 
You hear the rustling of leaves in the wind.

FOREST23.name: Clearing Exit
FOREST23.desc:
You find yourself at the entrance to a clearing. 
You hear the rustling of leaves in the wind. 
North of you is an old, abandoned town.

FOREST24.name: Northeastern Forest
FOREST24.desc:
You're deep in the forest, about as far north as you'll go. 
You hear the rustling of leaves in the wind.

FOREST25.name: Forest Northeast Corner
FOREST25.desc:
You're deep in the forest, about as far northeast as you'll go. 
You hear the rustling of leaves in the wind..

TOWN1.name: Abandonded Town Entrance
TOWN1.desc: You're at the entrance to an abandoned town. The town lies just North, the Forest is just South.

TOWN2.name: Abandonded Town South
TOWN2.desc: You're in the abandoned town. This place used to be bustling. It's a shame it's become abandoned.

TOWN3.name: Abandoned Town Center
TOWN3.desc: You're in the abandoned town. This place used to be bustling. It's a shame it's become abandoned.

TOWN4.name: Abandoned Town North
TOWN4.desc: You're in the abandoned town. This place used to be bustling. It's a shame it's become abandoned.

TOWN5.name: Abandoned Town Exit
TOWN5.desc: You're at the exit to an abandoned town. The town lies just South, the Mine Road is just Nouth.

RUINEDBUILDING1.name: Ruined Store
RUINEDBUILDING1.desc: You're in the ruins of an old store. There's not much left around.

items.desc: There's a small, old sack with some supplies in the corner.

RUINEDBUILDING2.name: Ruined House
RUINEDBUILDING2.desc: You're in a ruined house. There's not much left of it.

RUINEDBUILDING3.name: Ruined Tavern
RUINEDBUILDING3.desc: You're in the ruins of an old tavern. It's been mostly looted.

items.desc: A single bottle filled with an unknown liquid sits behind the counter.

RUINEDBUILDING4.name: Ruined House
RUINEDBUILDING4.desc: You're in a ruined house. There's not much left of it.

RUINEDBUILDING5.name: Rubble Pile
RUINEDBUILDING5.desc: There's nothing left of this building anymore.

RUINEDBUILDING6.name: Ruined House
RUINEDBUILDING6.desc: You're in a ruined house. There's not much left of it.

MINEROAD.name: Mine Road
MINEROAD.desc: This is the road that leads to the old mine. You need to go through the mines to get the White City.

MINEOUTSIDE.name: Outside the Mine
MINEOUTSIDE.desc:
You're standing outside the old mine. 
You can see light from inside, because magic keeps the torches inside lit.

MINE1.name: Mine Entrance
MINE1.desc:
You stand inside the entrance to the mine. 
It's not nearly as bright in here, but you can still see thanks to the torches.

MINE2.name: Mine
MINE2.desc: You're further inside the mine. It's surprisingly intact, given its age.

MINE3.name: Mine
MINE3.desc:
You're quite a ways into the mine. The torches have gotten dimmer, no doubt due to age. 
You might have to fix them on your way out.

MINE4.name: Mine
MINE4.desc:
You're very far into the mine. Some of the torches have completely gone out. 
Thankfully, you can still see pretty well. You'll definitely have to fix these later.

MINE5.name: Mine
MINE5.desc:
You're almost to the end of the mine. 
A couple of the side tunnels seem to have collapsed, but thankfully you don't need to use any of them.

MINE6.name: Mine
MINE6.desc: You've reached the end of the mine. The Elevator down to the White City lies in front of you.

MINEELEVTOPEN.name: Mine Elevator
MINEELEVTOPEN.desc: You step onto the old mine elevator. It creeks under your feet.

MINEELEVTOPEX.name: Mine Elevator
MINEELEVTOPEX.desc: The elevator creaks to a halt at the top.

MINEELEVBOTEN.name: Mine Elevator
MINEELEVBOTEN.desc: You step onto the old mine elevator. It creaks under your feet.

MINEELEVBOTEX.name: Mine Elevator
MINEELEVBOTEX.desc: The elevator creaks to a halt at the bottom.

WHITECITY1.name: White City Entrance
WHITECITY1.desc: You stand at the entrance to the White City. The Sealing Chamber lies straight North. The Mine Elevator is just South behind you.

WHITECITY2.name: White City Streets
WHITECITY2.desc: The White City is an ancient marvel. A testament to the conviction of the ancient people of this land.

WHITECITY3.name: White City Streets
WHITECITY3.desc: No one lives here anymore, of course. No one has for hundreds of years. Not since the incident.

WHITECITY4.name: White City Streets
WHITECITY4.desc:
The incident that needed a seal to be created. The seal you're in charge of keeping intact. 
The Sealing Chamber lies just ahead. No time to stop now.

SEALINGCHAMBER.name: Sealing Chamber
SEALINGCHAMBER.desc:
The pristine walls of the place always had an otherworld charm to them. 
It's almost as if the gods have been keeping this place that way. 
You check the seal. It's still intact, but fading. This is the place to use the crystal and restore the seal.

SEALEDABYSS.name: Sealed Abyss
SEALEDABYSS.desc:
You place the crystal on the altar, and step back. 
You watch as the crystal radiates energy and dissolves, being absorbed into the seal. 
You're duties are complete, and you can rest once more.
